summary.span: 表示应用程序域，它是一个应用程序在其中执行的独立环境。

span.span: Represents an application domain, which is an isolated environment where applications execute.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序域，由表示对象，帮助提供有关执行托管的代码的隔离、 卸载和安全边界。Application domains, which are represented by objects, help provide isolation, unloading, and security boundaries for executing managed code. - 使用应用程序域隔离可能会终止进程的任务。Use application domains to isolate tasks that might bring down a process. 如果状态，正在执行的任务变得不稳定，可以而不会影响进程中卸载。If the state of the that's executing a task becomes unstable, the can be unloaded without affecting the process. 进程必须运行很长一段无需重新启动时，这很重要。This is important when a process must run for long periods without restarting. 你还可以使用应用程序域隔离不应共享数据的任务。You can also use application domains to isolate tasks that should not share data. - 如果程序集被加载到默认应用程序域，它无法从内存中卸载过程运行时。If an assembly is loaded into the default application domain, it cannot be unloaded from memory while the process is running. 但是，如果您打开第二个应用程序域加载和执行程序集，程序集是卸载卸载该应用程序域时。However, if you open a second application domain to load and execute the assembly, the assembly is unloaded when that application domain is unloaded. 使用此方法最大程度减少偶尔使用大型 Dll 的长时间运行进程的工作集。Use this technique to minimize the working set of long-running processes that occasionally use large DLLs. 多个应用程序域可以运行在一个进程中;但是，没有应用程序域和线程之间的一对一的相关性。Multiple application domains can run in a single process; however, there is not a one-to-one correlation between application domains and threads. 多个线程可以属于单个应用程序域，并且单个应用程序域中时的给定的线程并不局限于单个应用程序域，在任何给定时间，执行线程。Several threads can belong to a single application domain, and while a given thread is not confined to a single application domain, at any given time, a thread executes in a single application domain. 使用创建应用程序域方法。Application domains are created using the method. 实例用于加载和执行程序集 ()。 instances are used to load and execute assemblies (). 当是不再在使用中，可以将它卸载。When an is no longer in use, it can be unloaded. 类实现的一组启用应用程序进行响应时加载的程序集，应用程序域将被卸载，或引发未经处理的异常时的事件。The class implements a set of events that enable applications to respond when an assembly is loaded, when an application domain will be unloaded, or when an unhandled exception is thrown. 有关使用应用程序域的详细信息，请参阅[应用程序域](~/docs/framework/app-domains/application-domains.md)。For more information on using application domains, see [Application Domains](~/docs/framework/app-domains/application-domains.md). 此类实现， ，和接口。This class implements the , , and interfaces. 决不要创建的远程操作包装对象。You should never create a remotable wrapper for an object. 这样可以将发布到的远程引用，如公开方法与远程访问和有效地销毁该的代码访问安全性。Doing so could publish a remote reference to that , exposing methods such as to remote access and effectively destroying code access security for that . 恶意客户端连接到远程无法获取任何资源的访问权限本身具有访问权限。Malicious clients connecting to the remoted could obtain access to any resource the itself has access to. 不创建任何扩展的类型的远程操作包装并实现恶意客户端无法用于绕过安全系统的方法。Do not create remotable wrappers for any type that extends and that implements methods that could be used by malicious clients to bypass the security system. > [!CAUTION] > 默认值为属性是`false`。The default value for the property is `false`. 此设置是不安全的服务。This setting is unsafe for services. 若要防止服务下载部分受信任的代码，请将此属性设置为`true`。To prevent services from downloading partially trusted code, set this property to `true`. ## Examples 此示例演示如何创建一个新，新实例化中的一个类型，以及与该类型的对象通信。This example shows how to create a new , instantiate a type in that new , and communicate with that type’s object. 此外，此示例演示如何卸载导致要进行垃圾回收的对象。In addition, this example shows how to unload the causing the object to be garbage collected. [!code-cpp[AppDomainX#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainX/cpp/AppDomainX.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomainX#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainX/cs/AppDomainX.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomainX#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainX/VB/AppDomainX.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在加载程序集时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an assembly is loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委托此事件指示哪些程序集被加载。The delegate for this event indicates what assembly was loaded. 若要注册的事件处理程序此事件，你必须具有所需的权限，或引发。To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a is thrown. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何事件。The following sample demonstrates the event. 若要运行此代码示例，你必须提供完全限定程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). summary.span: 在对程序集的解析失败时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the resolution of an assembly fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它负责此事件返回的程序集指定属性，或者若要返回无法识别程序集的情况下为 null。It is the responsibility of the for this event to return the assembly that is specified by the property, or to return null if the assembly is not recognized. 该程序集必须加载到执行上下文;如果它加载到只反射上下文，导致引发此事件加载会失败。The assembly must be loaded into an execution context; if it is loaded into the reflection-only context, the load that caused this event to be raised fails. 有关使用此事件的指南，请参阅[解析程序集加载](~/docs/framework/app-domains/resolve-assembly-loads.md)。For guidance on the use of this event, see [Resolving Assembly Loads](~/docs/framework/app-domains/resolve-assembly-loads.md). 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]、属性返回的请求无法解析的程序集加载的程序集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the property returns the assembly that requested the assembly load that could not be resolved. 例如，加载程序可能无法加载请求的程序集的依赖项，因为请求的程序集和其依赖项不探测路径中。For example, the loader might be unable to load a dependency of the requesting assembly because the requesting assembly and its dependency are not in the probing path. 了解请求的程序集的标识可能定位依赖项或者在很有用标识正确的版本，如果多个依赖项的版本可用。Knowing the identity of the requesting assembly might be useful in locating the dependency or in identifying the correct version, if more than one version of the dependency is available. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]、事件引发的所有程序集，包括资源程序集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the event is raised for all assemblies, including resource assemblies. 在早期版本中的资源程序集不引发事件。In earlier versions, the event was not raised for resource assemblies. 如果本地化操作系统，则可能会调用处理程序多次： 一次针对回退链中每个区域性。If the operating system is localized, the handler might be called multiple times: once for each culture in the fallback chain. 对于此事件，应用策略之前，属性将返回的程序集名称。For this event, the property returns the assembly name before policy is applied. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果此事件注册多个事件处理程序，不按顺序直到事件处理程序返回一个值事件 handlersarecalled `null`。If more than one event handler is registered for this event, the event handlersarecalled in order until an event handler returns a value that isn't `null`. 将忽略后续的事件处理程序。Subsequent event handlers are ignored. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何事件。The following sample demonstrates the event. 若要运行此代码示例，你必须提供完全限定程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). [!code-cpp[AssemblyResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyResolve/CPP/assemblyresolve.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyResolve/CS/assemblyresolve.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyResolve/VB/assemblyresolve.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重载使用从默认应用程序域的信息。This method overload uses the information from the default application domain. 如果`securityInfo`是未提供，用于从当前的应用程序域的证据。If `securityInfo` is not supplied, the evidence from the current application domain is used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不使用此方法重载来创建沙盒应用程序域。Do not use this method overload to create sandboxed application domains. 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，为提供的证据`securityInfo`不会再影响应用程序域的授予集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the evidence that is supplied for `securityInfo` no longer affects the grant set of the application domain. 使用方法重载来创建沙盒应用程序域。Use the method overload to create sandboxed application domains. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一般情况下，如何创建使用之一域重载。The following sample demonstrates, in general, how to create a domain using one of the overloads. summary.span: 指定在初始化应用程序域时调用的回调方法，以及传递回调方法的字符串实参数组。

span.span: Specifies a callback method that is invoked when the application domain is initialized, and an array of string arguments to pass the callback method.

returns.span: 新创建的应用程序域。

span.span: The newly created application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所表示的方法`adInit`在新创建的应用程序域的上下文中执行。The method represented by `adInit` is executed in the context of the newly created application domain. 如果`securityInfo`是未提供，用于从当前的应用程序域的证据。If `securityInfo` is not supplied, the evidence from the current application domain is used. 有关卷影复制的详细信息，请参阅和[影像复制程序集](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。For more information about shadow copying, see and [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md). > [!IMPORTANT] > 不使用此方法重载来创建沙盒应用程序域。Do not use this method overload to create sandboxed application domains. 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，为提供的证据`securityInfo`不会再影响应用程序域的授予集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the evidence that is supplied for `securityInfo` no longer affects the grant set of the application domain. 使用方法重载来创建沙盒应用程序域。Use the method overload to create sandboxed application domains.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用的默认构造函数`typeName`。This method calls the default constructor for `typeName`. 请参阅的格式`assemblyName`。See for the format of `assemblyName`. 尝试调用在目标上不是当前的应用程序域的应用程序域将导致目标应用程序域中的程序集成功加载。An attempt to call on a target application domain that is not the current application domain will result in a successful load of the assembly in the target application domain. 由于不，当此方法尝试返回到当前的应用程序域加载程序集，公共语言运行时将尝试将程序集加载到当前的应用程序域和负载可能会失败。Since an is not , when this method attempts to return the for the loaded assembly to the current application domain, the common language runtime will try to load the assembly into the current application domain and the load might fail. 可能不同于不同的两个应用程序域的路径设置是否首先加载的程序集加载到当前的应用程序域的程序集。The assembly that is loaded into the current application domain might be different from the assembly that was loaded first if the path settings for the two application domains are different.

summary.span: 创建在指定程序集中定义的指定类型的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the specified type defined in the specified assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅的格式`assemblyName`。See for the format of `assemblyName`. 尝试调用在目标上不是当前的应用程序域的应用程序域将导致目标应用程序域中的程序集成功加载。An attempt to call on a target application domain that is not the current application domain will result in a successful load of the assembly in the target application domain. 由于不，当此方法尝试返回到当前的应用程序域加载程序集，公共语言运行时将尝试将程序集加载到当前的应用程序域和负载可能会失败。Since an is not , when this method attempts to return the for the loaded assembly to the current application domain, the common language runtime will try to load the assembly into the current application domain and the load might fail. 可能不同于不同的两个应用程序域的路径设置是否首先加载的程序集加载到当前的应用程序域的程序集。The assembly that is loaded into the current application domain might be different from the assembly that was loaded first if the path settings for the two application domains are different.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是合并的便捷方法和。This is a convenience method that combines and . 此方法调用的默认构造函数`typeName`。This method calls the default constructor for `typeName`. 请参阅的格式`assemblyName`。See for the format of `assemblyName`. 请参阅属性的格式`typeName`。See the property for the format of `typeName`. > [!NOTE] > 如果进行早期绑定调用的方法`M`类型的对象的`T1`由返回，并方法使对类型的对象的方法的早期绑定调用`T2`的程序集中`C`以外当前程序集或包含的程序集`T1`，程序集`C`会加载到当前的应用程序域。If you make an early-bound call to a method `M` of an object of type `T1` that was returned by , and that method makes an early-bound call to a method of an object of type `T2` in an assembly `C` other than the current assembly or the assembly containing `T1`, assembly `C` is loaded into the current application domain. 如果即使早期绑定调用，则会发生此加载`T1.M()`的正文中进行，或在其他动态生成的代码中。This loading occurs even if the early-bound call to `T1.M()` was made in the body of a , or in other dynamically generated code. 如果当前域是默认域，程序集`C`进程结束前不能卸载。If the current domain is the default domain, assembly `C` cannot be unloaded until the process ends. 如果当前域稍后尝试加载程序集`C`，则加载可能失败。If the current domain later attempts to load assembly `C`, the load might fail. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示在另一个应用程序域中执行代码的最简单方法。The following code example shows the simplest way to execute code in another application domain. 该示例定义一个名为类`Worker`继承自。The example defines a class named `Worker` that inherits from . `Worker`类定义的方法，显示正在执行的应用程序域的名称。The `Worker` class defines a method that displays the name of the application domain in which it is executing. 该示例创建的实例`Worker`默认应用程序域中和新的应用程序域中。The example creates instances of `Worker` in the default application domain and in a new application domain. > [!NOTE] > 包含的程序集`Worker`必须加载到这两个应用程序域，但是它可以加载仅在新的应用程序域中存在其他程序集。The assembly that contains `Worker` must be loaded into both application domains, but it can load other assemblies that exist only in the new application domain. [!code-cpp[CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 创建在指定的程序集中定义的指定类型的新实例，指定是否忽略类型名称的大小写，并指定绑定特性和用于选择要创建的类型的联编程序、构造函数的自变量、区域性以及激活特性。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the specified type defined in the specified assembly, specifying whether the case of the type name is ignored; the binding attributes and the binder that are used to select the type to be created; the arguments of the constructor; the culture; and the activation attributes.

returns.span: 所指定对象的实例。

span.span: An instance of the object specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是合并的便捷方法和。This is a convenience method that combines and . 请参阅的格式`assemblyName`。See for the format of `assemblyName`. 请参阅属性的格式`typeName`。See the property for the format of `typeName`. > [!NOTE] > 如果进行早期绑定调用的方法`M`类型的对象的`T1`由返回，并方法使对类型的对象的方法的早期绑定调用`T2`的程序集中`C`以外当前程序集或包含的程序集`T1`，程序集`C`会加载到当前的应用程序域。If you make an early-bound call to a method `M` of an object of type `T1` that was returned by , and that method makes an early-bound call to a method of an object of type `T2` in an assembly `C` other than the current assembly or the assembly containing `T1`, assembly `C` is loaded into the current application domain. 如果即使早期绑定调用，则会发生此加载`T1.M()`的正文中进行，或在其他动态生成的代码中。This loading occurs even if the early-bound call to `T1.M()` was made in the body of a , or in other dynamically generated code. 如果当前域是默认域，程序集`C`进程结束前不能卸载。If the current domain is the default domain, assembly `C` cannot be unloaded until the process ends. 如果当前域稍后尝试加载程序集`C`，则加载可能失败。If the current domain later attempts to load assembly `C`, the load might fail. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用`ignoreCase`参数。The following sample demonstrates the use of the `ignoreCase` parameter. remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是合并的便捷方法和。This is a convenience method that combines and . 请参阅的格式`assemblyName`。See for the format of `assemblyName`. 请参阅属性的格式`typeName`。See the property for the format of `typeName`. > [!NOTE] > 如果进行早期绑定调用的方法`M`类型的对象的`T1`由返回，并方法使对类型的对象的方法的早期绑定调用`T2`的程序集中`C`以外当前程序集或包含的程序集`T1`，程序集`C`会加载到当前的应用程序域。If you make an early-bound call to a method `M` of an object of type `T1` that was returned by , and that method makes an early-bound call to a method of an object of type `T2` in an assembly `C` other than the current assembly or the assembly containing `T1`, assembly `C` is loaded into the current application domain. 如果即使早期绑定调用，则会发生此加载`T1.M()`的正文中进行，或在其他动态生成的代码中。This loading occurs even if the early-bound call to `T1.M()` was made in the body of a , or in other dynamically generated code. 如果当前域是默认域，程序集`C`进程结束前不能卸载。If the current domain is the default domain, assembly `C` cannot be unloaded until the process ends. 如果当前域稍后尝试加载程序集`C`，则加载可能失败。If the current domain later attempts to load assembly `C`, the load might fail. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用`ignoreCase`参数。The following sample demonstrates the use of the `ignoreCase` parameter. [!code-cpp[AppDomain_CreateInstance_IgnoreCase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_CreateInstance_IgnoreCase/CPP/ignorecase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_CreateInstance_IgnoreCase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_CreateInstance_IgnoreCase/CS/ignorecase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_CreateInstance_IgnoreCase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_CreateInstance_IgnoreCase/VB/ignorecase.vb#1)]

public: virtual System::Runtime::Remoting::ObjectHandle ^ CreateInstanceFrom(System::String ^ assemblyFile, System::String ^ typeName);

param.name: assemblyFile
param.span: 文件的名称（包括路径），该文件包含定义所请求类型的程序集。

span.span: The name, including the path, of a file that contains an assembly that defines the requested type.

param.span: 该程序集是使用 方法加载的。

span.span: The assembly is loaded using the method.

param.name: typeName
param.span: 属性返回的所请求类型的完全限定名称，包含命名空间而不是程序集。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认构造函数`typeName`调用。The default constructor for `typeName` is invoked. 有关更多信息，请参见 方法。For more information, see the method. 当方法用于在目标应用程序域中，而不从其进行调用的应用程序域中创建实例时，目标应用程序域中则加载程序集。When the method is used to create an instance in a target application domain, other than the application domain from which the call is made, the assembly is loaded in the target application domain. 但是，如果该实例调用的应用程序域处于解包，则以某些方式使用解包的实例会导致要加载到调用应用程序域的程序集。However, if the instance is unwrapped in the calling application domain, using the unwrapped instance in certain ways can cause the assembly to be loaded into the calling application domain. 例如，实例解包后，可能会请求其类型信息、 要调用其方法后期绑定。For example, after the instance is unwrapped, its type information might be requested, in order to call its methods late-bound. 程序集加载到调用应用程序域时，可能会发生异常。When the assembly is loaded into the calling application domain, exceptions can occur. - 如果以前的同一个程序集的另一个版本加载到调用应用程序域，或如果调用应用程序域的负载路径是不同的目标应用程序域，异常诸如可以发生。If another version of the same assembly was previously loaded into the calling application domain, or if the load path of the calling application domain is different from that of the target application domain, exceptions such as can occur. - 如果调用应用程序域进行早期绑定调用实例类型，当尝试强制转换实例可能会引发。If the calling application domain makes early-bound calls to the instance type, can be thrown when an attempt is made to cast the instance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法重载来创建目标应用程序域中的对象的实例并调用其方法。The following example shows how to use the method overload to create an instance of an object in a target application domain and call its methods. 该示例定义了`MarshallableExample`类，该类可以跨应用程序域边界进行封送。The example defines the `MarshallableExample` class, which can be marshaled across application domain boundaries. 该示例生成一个指向当前正在执行的程序集路径、 创建目标应用程序域，并使用方法重载，并将检索示例程序集加载到目标应用程序域创建的实例`MarshallableExample`。The example builds a path to the currently executing assembly, creates a target application domain, and uses the method overload to load the example assembly into the target application domain and create an instance of `MarshallableExample`. > [!NOTE] > 路径是绝对地址在此示例中，但相对路径也将起作用，因为方法用于加载程序集。The path is absolute in this example, but a relative path would also work because the method is used to load the assembly. 在解包该对象句柄之后, 的示例演示三种方法可以使用目标应用程序域中的对象：After unwrapping the object handle, the example demonstrates three ways to use an object in a target application domain: - 与使用反射后期绑定调用的方法。Invoking a method with late binding, using reflection. 这需要类型信息，这会导致要加载到调用方的应用程序域的程序集。This requires type information, which causes the assembly to be loaded into the application domain of the caller. （在此示例中，它已经加载。）(In this example, it is already loaded.) - 调用方和被调用方已知的接口的对象强制转换。Casting the object to an interface known to both the caller and the callee. 如果调用程序集中的或第三个调用方和被调用方所引用的程序集中定义接口，则调用的程序集不是加载到调用方的应用程序域。If the interface is defined in the calling assembly or in a third assembly referenced by both the caller and the callee, the called assembly is not loaded into the application domain of the caller. - 直接调用方已知其类型时，请使用对象。Using the object directly when its type is known to the caller. 该程序集必须加载到调用方的应用程序域。The assembly must be loaded into the application domain of the caller. 若要避免调用程序集加载到调用方的应用程序域的另一个方法是为派生自使调用方类并定义可以在目标应用程序域中运行的方法。Another way to avoid loading the called assembly into the application domain of the caller is for the caller to derive from the class and to define a method that can be run in the target application domain. 该方法可以使用反射来检查目标程序集，因为目标程序集已加载到目标应用程序域。That method can use reflection to examine a target assembly, because the target assembly is already loaded into the target application domain. 请参阅示例属性。See the example for the property. [!code-cpp[System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom_StringString#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.createinstancefrom_stringstring/cpp/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom_StringString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.createinstancefrom_stringstring/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom_StringString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.createinstancefrom_stringstring/vb/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关更多信息，请参见 方法。For more information, see the method. 当方法用于在目标应用程序域中，而不从其进行调用的应用程序域中创建实例时，目标应用程序域中则加载程序集。When the method is used to create an instance in a target application domain, other than the application domain from which the call is made, the assembly is loaded in the target application domain. 但是，如果该实例调用的应用程序域处于解包，则以某些方式使用解包的实例会导致要加载到调用应用程序域的程序集。However, if the instance is unwrapped in the calling application domain, using the unwrapped instance in certain ways can cause the assembly to be loaded into the calling application domain. 例如，实例解包后，可能会请求其类型信息、 要调用其方法后期绑定。For example, after the instance is unwrapped, its type information might be requested, in order to call its methods late-bound. 程序集加载到调用应用程序域时，可能会发生异常。When the assembly is loaded into the calling application domain, exceptions can occur. - 如果以前的同一个程序集的另一个版本加载到调用应用程序域，或如果调用应用程序域的负载路径是不同的目标应用程序域，异常诸如可以发生。If another version of the same assembly was previously loaded into the calling application domain, or if the load path of the calling application domain is different from that of the target application domain, exceptions such as can occur. - 如果调用应用程序域进行早期绑定调用实例类型，当尝试强制转换实例可能会引发。If the calling application domain makes early-bound calls to the instance type, can be thrown when an attempt is made to cast the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅应使用当前的应用程序域中定义的动态程序集。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 有关详细信息，请参阅方法重载。For more information, see the method overload. > [!NOTE] > 在开发期间用于发出动态程序集的代码，建议你使用的重载方法，它指定证据和权限，提供你想要具有，并且包含的动态程序集的证据中`refusedPermissions`.During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include in `refusedPermissions`. 包括中`refusedPermissions`参数可确保验证 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 此技术的局限性是它还使要求完全信任的代码一起使用时引发。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何方法和事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and event. 若要运行此代码示例，你必须提供完全限定程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). [!code-cpp[AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly/CPP/definedynamicassembly.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly/CS/definedynamicassembly.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly/VB/definedynamicassembly.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法重载来指定属性，除非在已应用创建的动态程序集时，可能无法正常工作。Use this method overload to specify attributes that do not work correctly unless they are applied when a dynamic assembly is created. 例如，安全特性例如和如果它们未添加创建的动态程序集后，可能无法正常工作。For example, security attributes such as and do not work correctly if they are added after a dynamic assembly has been created. 应使用此方法只能用于当前的应用程序域中定义的动态程序集。This method should be used only to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 有关此限制的详细信息，请参阅方法重载。For more information about this restriction, see the method overload. 此方法重载在中引入[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。This method overload is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建动态程序集具有。The following code sample shows how to create a dynamic assembly that has the . 该属性必须指定数组的元素为对象。The attribute must be specified as an element of an array of objects. 创建的第一步是获取属性的构造函数。The first step in creating the is to obtain a constructor for the attribute. 构造函数没有任何参数，因此的空数组调用方法时对象以表示的参数的类型。The constructor has no parameters, so the method is called with an empty array of objects to represent the types of the parameters. 第二步是将生成为构造函数的对象类，以及类型的空数组来表示的自变量。The second step is to pass the resulting object to the constructor for the class, together with an empty array of type to represent the arguments. 生成随后会传递给作为数组的唯一元素的方法。The resulting is then passed to the method as the only element of an array. 示例代码中新的动态程序集，定义模块和一个类型，然后显示程序集的特性。The example code defines a module and a type in the new dynamic assembly, and then displays the assembly's attributes. [!code-cpp[DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes/vb/source.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Declarative security for assembly level is no longer enforced")

param.name: name
param.span: 动态程序集的唯一标识。

span.span: The unique identity of the dynamic assembly.

param.name: access
param.span: 访问动态程序集所采用的模式。

span.span: The mode in which the dynamic assembly will be accessed.

param.name: evidence
param.span: 为动态程序集提供的证据。

span.span: The evidence supplied for the dynamic assembly.

param.span: 该证据始终作为最后一组用于策略解析的证据来使用。

span.span: The evidence is used unaltered as the final set of evidence used for policy resolution.

summary.span: 使用指定名称、访问模式和证据定义动态程序集。

span.span: Defines a dynamic assembly using the specified name, access mode, and evidence.

returns.span: 具有指定名称和功能的动态程序集。

span.span: A dynamic assembly with the specified name and features.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅完全受信任的调用方可以提供其`evidence`定义动态时。Only fully trusted callers can supply their `evidence` when defining a dynamic . 运行时将映射通过安全策略以确定授予的权限。The runtime will map the through the security policy to determine the granted permissions. 部分受信任的调用方必须提供一个为 null 的`evidence`。Partially trusted callers must supply a null `evidence`. 如果`evidence`是`null`、 运行时将复制的权限集，也就是说，当前授予和拒绝集，从调用方的为动态正在定义并将策略标记为已解决。If `evidence` is `null`, the runtime copies the permission sets, that is, the current grant and deny sets, from the caller's to the dynamic being defined and marks policy as resolved. 如果动态是保存到磁盘，后面的加载将获得授予基于与位置关联的策略其中已保存。If the dynamic is saved to disk, subsequent loads will get grants based on policies associated with the location where the was saved. 此方法仅应使用当前的应用程序域中定义的动态程序集。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 有关详细信息，请参阅方法重载。For more information, see the method overload. > [!NOTE] > 在开发期间用于发出动态程序集的代码，建议你使用的重载方法，它指定证据和权限，提供你想要具有，并且包含的动态程序集的证据中`refusedPermissions`.During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include in `refusedPermissions`. 包括中`refusedPermissions`参数可确保验证 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 此技术的局限性是它还使要求完全信任的代码一起使用时引发。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何方法和事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and the event. 首先，此代码示例尝试创建的实例`MyDynamicType`通过调用具有无效的程序集名称，方法和捕获产生的异常。First, the code example tries to create an instance of `MyDynamicType` by calling the method with an invalid assembly name, and catches the resulting exception. 然后，该代码示例添加的事件处理程序事件，并再次尝试创建的实例`MyDynamicType`。The code example then adds an event handler for the event, and again tries to create an instance of`MyDynamicType`. 在调用期间、无效的程序集对引发事件。During the call to , the event is raised for the invalid assembly. 事件处理程序创建包含名为的类型的动态程序集`MyDynamicType`，为该类型提供的无参数构造函数，并返回新的动态程序集。The event handler creates a dynamic assembly that contains a type named `MyDynamicType`, gives the type a parameterless constructor, and returns the new dynamic assembly. 调用成功，然后完成的构造函数和`MyDynamicType`在控制台显示一条消息。The call to then finishes successfully, and the constructor for `MyDynamicType` displays a message at the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅应使用当前的应用程序域中定义的动态程序集。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 有关详细信息，请参阅方法重载。For more information, see the method overload. > [!NOTE] > 在开发期间用于发出动态程序集的代码，建议你使用的重载方法，它指定证据和权限，提供你想要具有，并且包含的动态程序集的证据中`refusedPermissions`.During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include in `refusedPermissions`. 包括中`refusedPermissions`参数可确保验证 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 此技术的局限性是它还使要求完全信任的代码一起使用时引发。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何方法和事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and event. 若要运行此代码示例，你必须提供完全限定程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法重载来指定属性，除非在已应用创建的动态程序集时，可能无法正常工作。Use this method overload to specify attributes that do not work correctly unless they are applied when a dynamic assembly is created. 例如，安全特性例如和如果它们未添加创建的动态程序集后，可能无法正常工作。For example, security attributes such as and do not work correctly if they are added after a dynamic assembly has been created. 应使用此方法只能用于当前的应用程序域中定义的动态程序集。This method should be used only to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 有关此限制的详细信息，请参阅方法重载。For more information about this restriction, see the method overload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为指定的权限请求`requiredPermissions`， `optionalPermissions`，和`refusedPermissions`不使用除非保存动态程序集并将其重新加载到内存。The permission requests specified for `requiredPermissions`, `optionalPermissions`, and `refusedPermissions` are not used unless the dynamic assembly has been saved and reloaded into memory. 若要指定从不会保存到磁盘中，使用的重载的瞬态程序集的权限请求方法，它指定证据和所请求的权限，并提供对象。To specify permission requests for a transient assembly that is never saved to disk, use an overload of the method that specifies evidence as well as requested permissions, and supply an object. > [!NOTE] > 在开发期间用于发出动态程序集的代码，建议你使用的重载方法，它指定证据和权限，提供你想要具有，并且包含的动态程序集的证据中`refusedPermissions`.During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include in `refusedPermissions`. 包括中`refusedPermissions`参数可确保验证 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 此技术的局限性是它还使要求完全信任的代码一起使用时引发。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. 此方法仅应使用当前的应用程序域中定义的动态程序集。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 有关详细信息，请参阅方法重载。For more information, see the method overload . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何方法和事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and event. 若要运行此代码示例，你必须提供完全限定程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). param.span: 动态程序集的唯一标识。

param.span: 必需的权限请求。

param.span: 可选的权限请求。

summary.span: 使用指定名称、访问模式、证据和权限请求定义动态程序集。

span.span: Defines a dynamic assembly using the specified name, access mode, evidence, and permission requests.

returns.span: 具有指定名称和功能的动态程序集。

span.span: A dynamic assembly with the specified name and features.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为指定的权限请求`requiredPermissions`， `optionalPermissions`，和`refusedPermissions`才会使用`evidence`还提供，或如果动态程序集保存并重新加载到内存。The permission requests specified for `requiredPermissions`, `optionalPermissions`, and `refusedPermissions` are used only if `evidence` is also supplied, or if the dynamic assembly is saved and reloaded into memory. > [!NOTE] > 在开发期间用于发出动态程序集的代码，建议你在包含中`refusedPermissions`。During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you include in `refusedPermissions`. 包括中`refusedPermissions`参数可确保验证 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 此技术的局限性是它还使要求完全信任的代码一起使用时引发。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. 仅完全受信任的调用方可以提供其`evidence`定义动态时。Only fully trusted callers can supply their `evidence` when defining a dynamic . 运行时将映射通过安全策略以确定授予的权限。The runtime will map the through the security policy to determine the granted permissions. 部分受信任的调用方必须提供一个为 null 的`evidence`。Partially trusted callers must supply a null `evidence`. 如果`evidence`是`null`、 运行时将复制的权限集，也就是说，当前授予和拒绝集，从调用方的为动态正在定义并将策略标记为已解决。If `evidence` is `null`, the runtime copies the permission sets, that is, the current grant and deny sets, from the caller's to the dynamic being defined and marks policy as resolved. 如果动态是保存到磁盘，后面的加载将获得授予基于与位置关联的策略其中已保存。If the dynamic is saved to disk, subsequent loads will get grants based on policies associated with the location where the was saved. 此方法仅应使用当前的应用程序域中定义的动态程序集。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 有关详细信息，请参阅方法重载。For more information, see the method overload. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何方法和事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and event. 若要运行此代码示例，你必须提供完全限定程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 为指定的权限请求`requiredPermissions`， `optionalPermissions`，和`refusedPermissions`不使用除非保存动态程序集并将其重新加载到内存。The permission requests specified for `requiredPermissions`, `optionalPermissions`, and `refusedPermissions` are not used unless the dynamic assembly has been saved and reloaded into memory. 若要指定从不会保存到磁盘中，使用的重载的瞬态程序集的权限请求方法，它指定证据和所请求的权限，并提供对象。To specify permission requests for a transient assembly that is never saved to disk, use an overload of the method that specifies evidence as well as requested permissions, and supply an object. > [!NOTE] > 在开发期间用于发出动态程序集的代码，建议你使用的重载方法，它指定证据和权限，提供你想要具有，并且包含的动态程序集的证据中`refusedPermissions`.During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include in `refusedPermissions`. 包括中`refusedPermissions`参数可确保验证 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 此技术的局限性是它还使要求完全信任的代码一起使用时引发。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. 此方法仅应使用当前的应用程序域中定义的动态程序集。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 有关详细信息，请参阅方法重载。For more information, see the method overload. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何方法和事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and event. 若要运行此代码示例，你必须提供完全限定程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法重载来指定属性，除非在已应用创建的动态程序集时，可能无法正常工作。Use this method overload to specify attributes that do not work correctly unless they are applied when a dynamic assembly is created. 例如，安全特性例如和如果它们未添加创建的动态程序集后，可能无法正常工作。For example, security attributes such as and do not work correctly if they are added after a dynamic assembly has been created. 为指定的权限请求`requiredPermissions`， `optionalPermissions`，和`refusedPermissions`参数才会使用`evidence`还提供参数，或如果动态程序集保存并重新加载到内存。The permission requests specified for the `requiredPermissions`, `optionalPermissions`, and `refusedPermissions` parameters are used only if the `evidence` parameter is also supplied, or if the dynamic assembly is saved and reloaded into memory. > [!NOTE] > 当你开发的代码所发出动态程序集时，我们建议你包括中标记出来`refusedPermissions`参数。When you develop code that emits dynamic assemblies, we recommend that you include the flag in the `refusedPermissions` parameter. 此标志包含可确保的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 将进行验证。The inclusion of this flag ensures that the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) will be verified. 此方法会检测无意间生成无法验证的代码，否则为它是很难检测到了。This technique will detect the unintentional generation of unverifiable code, which otherwise is very difficult to detect. 此技术的局限性是它还使当它用于要求完全信任的代码时引发。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when it is used with code that demands full trust. 仅完全受信任调用方可以提供证据定义动态时。Only fully trusted callers can supply evidence when defining a dynamic . 运行时将映射通过安全策略以确定授予的权限。The runtime maps the through the security policy to determine the granted permissions. 部分受信任的调用方必须提供`null`为`evidence`参数。Partially trusted callers must supply `null` for the `evidence` parameter. 如果`evidence`是`null`，运行时将从调用方的程序集的权限集 （即，当前授予和拒绝集） 复制到正在定义中，并将策略标记为已解决的动态程序集。If `evidence` is `null`, the runtime copies the permission sets (that is, the current grant and deny sets) from the caller's assembly to the dynamic assembly that is being defined, and marks the policy as resolved. 如果将动态程序集保存到磁盘，后续加载将获得授予基于保存动态程序集的位置与关联的策略。If the dynamic assembly is saved to disk, subsequent loads will get grants based on policies that are associated with the location where the dynamic assembly was saved. 如果`isSynchronized`是`true`，生成的以下方法将同步： ， ， ， ， ，和。If `isSynchronized` is `true`, the following methods of the resulting will be synchronized: , , , , , and . 如果其中两种方法在不同的线程调用的一个将其他完成之前一直阻止。If two of these methods are called on different threads, one will block until the other is completed. 此方法重载在中引入[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。This method overload is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].

summary.span: 获得初始化应用程序域时主机提供的域管理器。

span.span: Gets the domain manager that was provided by the host when the application domain was initialized.

value.span: 一个对象，表示初始化应用程序域时主机提供的域管理器；或者如果没有提供域管理器，则返回 。

span.span: An object that represents the domain manager provided by the host when the application domain was initialized, or if no domain manager was provided.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时 (CLR) 的非托管的主机可以提供域管理器。An unmanaged host of the common language runtime (CLR) can provide a domain manager. 域管理器可以参与初始化新的应用程序域，并提供其他管理器，如，该元素参与应用程序域的操作。The domain manager can participate in initializing the new application domain and supply other managers, such as a , that participate in the operations of the application domain.

permission.span: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

.event class System.EventHandler DomainUnload
Public Custom Event DomainUnload As EventHandler
public: virtual event EventHandler ^ DomainUnload;

summary.span: 在即将卸载 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an is about to be unloaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委托中卸载应用程序域之前，此事件可以执行任何终止活动。The delegate for this event can perform any termination activities before the application domain is unloaded. 需要用来执行处理卸载时每个应用程序域应该注册的事件处理程序此事件。Each application domain that needs to perform processing when it is unloaded should register an event handler for this event. 共享的事件处理程序不应使用，因为委托不会确定正在卸载的域。A shared event handler should not be used, because the delegate does not identify the domain that is being unloaded. > [!NOTE] > 默认应用程序域中永远不会引发此事件。This event is never raised in the default application domain. 不进行有关线程引发该事件的假设。Do not make assumptions about the thread the event is raised on. 可以在与调用的一个不同的线程上引发该事件方法。The event can be raised on a different thread than the one that called the method. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public string DynamicDirectory { get; }
.property instance string DynamicDirectory
Public ReadOnly Property DynamicDirectory As String
public: property System::String ^ DynamicDirectory { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取目录，它由程序集冲突解决程序用来探测动态创建的程序集。

span.span: Gets the directory that the assembly resolver uses to probe for dynamically created assemblies.

value.span: 目录，它由程序集冲突解决程序用来探测动态创建的程序集。

span.span: The directory that the assembly resolver uses to probe for dynamically created assemblies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要设置的动态目录，分配的基目录路径属性将用于创建新的应用程序域的对象。To set the dynamic directory, assign a base directory path to the property of the object that will be used to create the new application domain. 分配给属性的基目录路径修改通过其简单的名称是你将分配给字符串的哈希代码的子目录添加属性，因此基目录的格式是*原始路径* \\*哈希代码*。The base directory path you assign to the property is modified by the addition of a subdirectory whose simple name is the hash code of the string you assign to the property, so the format of the base directory is *original path*\\*hash code*. 动态目录是此基目录的子目录。The dynamic directory is a subdirectory of this base directory. 其简单的名称为的值属性，因此其格式是*原始路径*\\*哈希代码*\\*应用程序名称*。Its simple name is the value of the property, so its format is *original path*\\*hash code*\\*application name*. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个应用程序域与目录的动态程序集、 发出动态程序集并将其存储在动态目录中，然后集加载到新的应用程序域并使用它。The following example creates an application domain with a directory for dynamic assemblies, emits a dynamic assembly and stores it in the dynamic directory, and then loads the assembly into the new application domain and uses it. 该示例创建对象并设置其属性设置为"示例"并将其"C:\DynamicAssemblyDir"的属性。The example creates an object and sets its property to "Example" and its property to "C:\DynamicAssemblyDir". 然后该示例显示属性，以显示应用程序名称的哈希代码，已追加视为最初分配的路径的子目录。The example then displays the property, to show that the hash code of the application name has been appended as a subdirectory of the path that was originally assigned. > [!NOTE] > 在此示例中的基目录旨在将示例应用程序的探测路径之外。The base directory in this example is intended to be outside the probing path for the example application. 请务必编译中的不同位置的示例。Be sure to compile the example in a different location. 每次运行该示例删除基目录和所有子目录。Delete the base directory and all its subdirectories each time you run the example. 该示例创建一个新的应用程序域，使用对象。The example creates a new application domain, using the object. 该示例使用属性来检索目录的名称，因此它可以创建目录。The example uses the property to retrieve the name of the directory, so it can create the directory. （该示例可以轻松地事先创建目录通过串联的原始路径、 应用程序名称和应用程序名称的哈希代码。）(The example could just as easily create the directory beforehand by concatenating the original path, the hash code of the application name, and the application name.) 本示例具有`GenerateDynamicAssembly`发出名为程序集的方法`DynamicHelloWorld.dll`并将其存储在新应用程序域的动态目录。The example has a `GenerateDynamicAssembly` method that emits an assembly named `DynamicHelloWorld.dll` and stores it in the new application domain's dynamic directory. 动态程序集包含一个类型， `HelloWorld`，具有一个静态方法 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中的方法) 名为`HelloFromAD`。The dynamic assembly contains one type, `HelloWorld`, that has a static method (`Shared` method in Visual Basic) named `HelloFromAD`. 调用此方法显示应用程序域的名称。Calling this method displays the name of the application domain. `Example`类派生自，因此该示例可以创建类的实例中的新应用程序域和调用其`Test`方法。The `Example` class derives from , so the example can create an instance of the class in the new application domain and call its `Test` method. `Test`方法加载的动态程序集按其显示名称，并调用静态`HelloFromAD`方法。The `Test` method loads the dynamic assembly by its display name and calls the static `HelloFromAD` method. 你可以显示在正常的探测路径后搜索的动态目录，通过对名为程序集编写代码`DynamicHelloWorld.dll`并将其编译此示例为同一个目录中。You can show that the dynamic directory is searched after the normal probing paths by writing code for an assembly named `DynamicHelloWorld.dll` and compiling it in the same directory as this example. 程序集必须具有一个名为类`HelloWorld`与一个名为的静态方法`HelloFromAD`。The assembly must have a class named `HelloWorld` with a static method named `HelloFromAD`. 此方法不需要具有相同的功能与在这些示例。它只是可以向控制台显示字符串。This method does not have to have the same functionality as the one in the example; it can simply display a string to the console. 程序集必须还具有将其版本设置为 1.0.0.0 的属性。The assembly must also have an attribute that sets its version to 1.0.0.0. 运行示例时，当前目录中编译的程序集位于之前搜索的动态目录。When you run the example, the assembly you compiled in the current directory is found before the dynamic directory is searched. [!code-cpp[ADDynamicBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDynamicBase/CPP/addynamicbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADDynamicBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDynamicBase/CS/addynamicbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADDynamicBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDynamicBase/VB/addynamicbase.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 程序集开始在.NET Framework 标头中指定的入口点执行。The assembly begins executing at the entry point specified in the .NET Framework header. 此方法不会创建新的进程或应用程序域，并且不会在新线程上执行入口点方法。This method does not create a new process or application domain, and it does not execute the entry point method on a new thread. 此方法加载程序集使用方法。This method loads assemblies using the method. 你还可以执行程序集使用方法，后者将加载程序集使用方法。You can also execute assemblies using the method, which loads assemblies using the method. 若要创建加载并执行，请使用方法。To create the to load and execute, use the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用的重载之一在两个不同的域。The following sample demonstrates using one of the overloads of on two different domains. MemberSignature.Value: public event EventHandler<System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs> FirstChanceException;
.event class System.EventHandler`1<class System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs> FirstChanceException
Public Custom Event FirstChanceException As EventHandler(Of FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs)
public: event EventHandler<System::Runtime::ExceptionServices::FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs ^> ^ FirstChanceException;

summary.span: 当托管代码抛出异常时发生，在运行时在调用堆栈中搜索应用程序域中的异常处理程序之前。

span.span: Occurs when an exception is thrown in managed code, before the runtime searches the call stack for an exception handler in the application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件是仅一个通知。This event is only a notification. 处理此事件不会处理的异常或会影响后续以任何方式处理的异常。Handling this event does not handle the exception or affect subsequent exception handling in any way. 引发事件并在调用事件处理程序后，公共语言运行时 (CLR) 开始搜索的异常处理程序。After the event has been raised and event handlers have been invoked, the common language runtime (CLR) begins to search for a handler for the exception. 第一个机会检查任何托管的异常中提供的应用程序域。 provides the application domain with a first chance to examine any managed exception. 每个应用程序域可以处理此事件。The event can be handled per application domain. 如果一个线程通过多个应用程序域传递执行调用时，CLR 开始搜索该应用程序域中的匹配异常处理程序之前已注册事件处理程序，每个应用程序域中将引发事件。If a thread passes through multiple application domains while executing a call, the event is raised in each application domain that has registered an event handler, before the CLR begins searching for a matching exception handler in that application domain. 处理此事件后，将为该应用程序域中的匹配异常处理程序中进行搜索。After the event has been handled, a search is made for a matching exception handler in that application domain. 如果找不到下, 一步的应用程序域中将引发事件。If none is found, the event is raised in the next application domain. 你必须处理发生在事件处理程序的所有异常事件。You must handle all exceptions that occur in the event handler for the event. 否则为递归地引发。Otherwise, is raised recursively. 这可能导致堆栈上溢和终止应用程序。This could result in a stack overflow and termination of the application. 我们建议你实现此事件的事件处理程序作为受约束的执行区域 (Cer)，以防止与基础结构相关的异常，例如内存不足或堆栈溢出异常通知时影响虚拟机正在处理。We recommend that you implement event handlers for this event as constrained execution regions (CERs), to keep infrastructure-related exceptions such as out-of-memory or stack overflow from affecting the virtual machine while the exception notification is being processed. 此事件不会引发的异常的指示损坏进程的状态，例如访问冲突，除非事件处理程序是安全关键，并且具有属性。This event is not raised for exceptions that indicate corruption of process state, such as access violations, unless the event handler is security-critical and has the attribute. 公共语言运行时挂起线程中止时正在处理此通知事件。The common language runtime suspends thread aborts while this notification event is being handled. ## Examples 下面的示例创建名为的应用程序域的一系列`AD0`通过`AD3`，与`Worker`每个应用程序域中的对象。The following example creates a series of application domains named `AD0` through `AD3`, with a `Worker` object in each application domain. 每个`Worker`对象具有对引用`Worker`对象在下一步的应用程序域中，除`Worker`最后一个应用程序域中。Each `Worker` object has a reference to the `Worker` object in the next application domain, except for the `Worker` in the last application domain. 除外的所有应用程序域中处理事件`AD1`。The event is handled in all application domains except `AD1`. > [!NOTE] > 除了此示例中，其演示了多个应用程序域中的首次异常通知，你可以找到在简单的用例[如何： 接收首次异常通知](~/docs/framework/app-domains/how-to-receive-first-chance-exception-notifications.md)。In addition to this example, which demonstrates first-chance exception notifications in multiple application domains, you can find simple use cases in [How to: Receive First-Chance Exception Notifications](~/docs/framework/app-domains/how-to-receive-first-chance-exception-notifications.md). 默认应用程序域创建的应用程序域后，调用`TestException`第一个应用程序域的方法。When the application domains have been created, the default application domain calls the `TestException` method for the first application domain. 每个`Worker`对象调用`TestException`方法下一步的应用程序域，直到最后一个`Worker`引发已处理，或者未经处理的异常。Each `Worker` object calls the `TestException` method for the next application domain, until the last `Worker` throws an exception that is either handled or unhandled. 因此，当前线程通过所有应用程序域和`TestException`添加到每个应用程序域中的堆栈。Thus, the current thread passes through all the application domains, and `TestException` is added to the stack in each application domain. 当最后一个`Worker`对象处理异常，仅在最后一个应用程序域中引发事件。When the last `Worker` object handles the exception, the event is raised only in the last application domain. 其他应用程序域永远不会获得一个机会处理异常，因此不引发该事件。The other application domains never get a chance to handle the exception, so the event is not raised. 当最后一个`Worker`对象并不处理异常，每个应用程序域中具有事件处理程序引发事件。When the last `Worker` object does not handle the exception, the event is raised in each application domain that has an event handler. 每个事件处理程序完成后，堆栈将继续展开，直到默认应用程序域中捕获该异常。After each event handler has finished, the stack continues to unwind until the exception is caught by the default application domain. > [!NOTE] > 若要查看堆栈显示为更接近引发该事件的增长和接近默认应用程序域，请更改`e.Exception.Message`到`e.Exception`中`FirstChanceHandler`事件处理程序。To see how the stack display grows as the event is raised closer and closer to the default application domain, change `e.Exception.Message` to `e.Exception` in the `FirstChanceHandler` event handlers. 请注意，当`TestException`调用跨应用程序域边界进行，则它会出现两次： 一次针对该代理，一次存根 （stub）。Notice that when `TestException` is called across application domain boundaries, it appears twice: once for the proxy and once for the stub. [!code-csharp[System.AppDomain.FirstChanceException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.firstchanceexception/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomain.FirstChanceException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.firstchanceexception/vb/example.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取此应用程序域的友好名称。

span.span: Gets the friendly name of this application domain.

value.span: 此应用程序域的友好名称。

span.span: The friendly name of this application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认应用程序域的友好名称是进程可执行文件的文件名。The friendly name of the default application domain is the file name of the process executable. 例如，如果使用可执行文件以启动该过程是`"c:\MyAppDirectory\MyAssembly.exe"`，默认应用程序域的友好名称是`"MyAssembly.exe"`。For example, if the executable used to start the process is `"c:\MyAppDirectory\MyAssembly.exe"`, the friendly name of the default application domain is `"MyAssembly.exe"`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来获取当前应用程序域的友好名称。The following code example uses the property to get the friendly name of the current application domain. 对于默认应用程序域的友好名称是应用程序的可执行文件的名称。For the default application domain, the friendly name is the name of the application's executable file. 下面的代码示例还显示有关应用程序域的其他信息。The code example also displays additional information about the application domain. [!code-cpp[ADApplicationBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADApplicationBase/CPP/adapplicationbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADApplicationBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADApplicationBase/CS/adapplicationbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADApplicationBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADApplicationBase/VB/adapplicationbase.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取已加载到此应用程序域的执行上下文中的程序集。

span.span: Gets the assemblies that have been loaded into the execution context of this application domain.

returns.span: 此应用程序域中的程序集的数组。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法以获取已加载到应用程序域的所有程序集的列表。The following code example uses the method to get a list of all assemblies that have been loaded into the application domain. 程序集将显示到控制台。The assemblies are then displayed to the console. 若要运行此代码示例，你需要创建一个名为的程序集`CustomLibrary.dll`，或更改程序集名称传递给方法。To run this code example, you need to create an assembly named `CustomLibrary.dll`, or change the assembly name that is passed to the method. remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用此方法来检索中描述的此实例的属性的名称数据对内部缓存条目的值。Use this method to retrieve the value of an entry in an internal cache of name-data pairs that describe properties of this instance of . 请注意，比较`name`同名的键 / 值对是区分大小写。Note that the comparison of `name` with the name of key-value pairs is case-sensitive. 该缓存自动包含在创建应用程序域后插入的预定义的系统项。The cache automatically contains predefined system entries that are inserted when the application domain is created. 你可以检查它们的值与方法或等效属性。You can inspect their values with the method, or the equivalent properties. 你可以插入或修改与自己用户定义名称数据对方法，并检查其值与方法。You can insert or modify your own user defined name-data pairs with the method and inspect their values with the method. 下表描述了`name`每个预定义系统条目和其对应属性。The following table describes the `name` of each predefined system entry and its corresponding property. |Name 的值Value of 'name'|PropertyProperty| |---------------------|--------------| |"APPBASE""APPBASE"|| |"APP_CONFIG_FILE""APP_CONFIG_FILE"|| |"APP_LAUNCH_URL""APP_LAUNCH_URL"|（没有属性）(no property)

"APP_LAUNCH_URL"表示最初由用户之前任何重定向请求的 URL。"APP_LAUNCH_URL" represents the URL originally requested by the user, before any redirection. 仅当使用如 Internet Explorer 浏览器中启动应用程序时，才，它才可用。It is available only when the application has been launched with a browser such as Internet Explorer. 并非所有浏览器提供此值。Not all browsers provide this value.| |"APP_NAME""APP_NAME"|| |"BINPATH_PROBE_ONLY""BINPATH_PROBE_ONLY"|| |"CACHE_BASE""CACHE_BASE"|| |"CODE_DOWNLOAD_DISABLED""CODE_DOWNLOAD_DISABLED"|| |"DEV_PATH""DEV_PATH"|（没有属性）(no property)| |"DISALLOW_APP""DISALLOW_APP"|| |"DISALLOW_APP_BASE_PROBING""DISALLOW_APP_BASE_PROBING"|| |"DISALLOW_APP_REDIRECTS""DISALLOW_APP_REDIRECTS"|| |"DYNAMIC_BASE""DYNAMIC_BASE"|| |"FORCE_CACHE_INSTALL""FORCE_CACHE_INSTALL"|| |"LICENSE_FILE"或特定于应用程序字符串"LICENSE_FILE", or an application-specific string|| |"LOADER_OPTIMIZATION""LOADER_OPTIMIZATION"|| |"LOCATION_URI""LOCATION_URI"|（没有属性）(no property)| |"PRIVATE_BINPATH""PRIVATE_BINPATH"|| |"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT""REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT"|

"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT"不是系统条目，并且其值可以通过调用设置方法。"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" is not a system entry, and its value can be set by calling the method.| |"SHADOW_COPY_DIRS""SHADOW_COPY_DIRS"|| ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新的应用程序域、 设置域，系统提供的值并添加新域值对。The following example creates a new application domain, sets a system-provided value for the domain, and adds a new value pair for the domain. 该示例然后演示如何使用方法从这些值对检索数据并将它们显示到控制台。The example then demonstrates how to use the method to retrieve the data from these value pairs and display them to the console. [!code-cpp[ADGetData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADGetData/CPP/adgetdata.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADGetData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADGetData/CS/adgetdata.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADGetData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADGetData/VB/adgetdata.vb#1)]

param.name: value
param.span: 要测试的兼容性开关。

span.span: The compatibility switch to test.

summary.span: 获取可以为 null 的布尔值，该值指示是否设置了任何兼容性开关，如果已设置，则指定是否设置了指定的兼容性开关。

span.span: Gets a nullable Boolean value that indicates whether any compatibility switches are set, and if so, whether the specified compatibility switch is set.

returns.span: 如果未设置任何兼容性开关，则为 null 引用（Visual Basic 中的 ）；否则，为布尔值，指示是否设置了由 指定的兼容性开关。

span.span: A null reference ( in Visual Basic) if no compatibility switches are set; otherwise, a Boolean value that indicates whether the compatibility switch that is specified by is set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法测试是否已为当前的应用程序域中设置了指定的兼容性开关。This method tests whether the specified compatibility switch has been set for the current application domain. 兼容性开关通常还原行为 （例如，字符串的方式进行排序），.NET Framework 的版本间已改变。Compatibility switches typically restore a behavior (such as the way strings are sorted) that was changed between versions of the .NET Framework. 它们设置的调用方法，然后才能创建应用程序域。They are set by calling the method before creating an application domain. 下表提供兼容性开关，可设置为还原的.NET Framework 的早期版本的行为的示例。The following table provides examples of compatibility switches that can be set to restore the behavior of earlier versions of the .NET Framework. |开关Switch|含义Meaning| |------------|-------------| |"NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy""NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy"|代码访问安全性 (CAS)[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]在此应用程序域中启用。Code access security (CAS) for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] is enabled in this application domain. 请参阅[ <NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md)。See [<NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md).| |"NetFx40_Legacy20SortingBehavior""NetFx40_Legacy20SortingBehavior"|字符串排序的默认值[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]在此应用程序域中启用。String sorting defaults for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] are enabled in this application domain. 其成功要求 sort00001000.dll 安装。Its success requires sort00001000.dll to be installed. 请参阅[ <CompatSortNLSVersion>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/compatsortnlsversion-element.md)。See [<CompatSortNLSVersion> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/compatsortnlsversion-element.md).| |"NetFx40_Legacy40SortingBehavior""NetFx40_Legacy40SortingBehavior"|字符串排序的默认值[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]和在此应用程序域中启用 Unicode 5.0。String sorting defaults for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]and Unicode 5.0 are enabled in this application domain. 其成功要求 sort00060101.dll 安装。Its success requires sort00060101.dll to be installed.| |"NetFx40_TimeSpanLegacyFormatMode""NetFx40_TimeSpanLegacyFormatMode"| 格式设置行为[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]在此应用程序域中启用。 formatting behavior for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] is enabled in this application domain. 请参阅[ <TimeSpan_LegacyFormatMode>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/timespan-legacyformatmode-element.md)和"还原旧时间跨度格式设置"部分的主题。See [<TimeSpan_LegacyFormatMode> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/timespan-legacyformatmode-element.md) and the "Restoring Legacy TimeSpan Formatting" section of the topic.| |"UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm""UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm"|运行时计算字符串的哈希代码上每个应用程序域而不是使用单一的哈希算法跨应用程序域中生成的一致的哈希代码。The runtime calculates hash codes for strings on a per application domain basis instead of using a single hashing algorithm that produces a consistent hash code across application domains. 请参阅[ <UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/userandomizedstringhashalgorithm-element.md)。See [<UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/userandomizedstringhashalgorithm-element.md).|

[!code-cpp[System.AppDomain.IsDefaultAppDomain#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomain.IsDefaultAppDomain/CPP/System.AppDomain.IsDefaultAppDomain.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.AppDomain.IsDefaultAppDomain#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomain.IsDefaultAppDomain/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomain.IsDefaultAppDomain#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomain.IsDefaultAppDomain/VB/source.vb#1)]

public: bool IsFinalizingForUnload();

summary.span: 指示此应用程序域是否正在卸载以及公共语言运行时是否正在终止该域包含的对象。

span.span: Indicates whether this application domain is unloading, and the objects it contains are being finalized by the common language runtime.

returns.span: 如果此应用程序域正在卸载，并且公共语言运行时已开始调用终止程序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this application domain is unloading and the common language runtime has started invoking finalizers; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象的完成方法提供机会在对象垃圾回收之前执行任何必要的清理操作。The finalization method for an object provides you an opportunity to perform any necessary cleanup operations before the object is garbage collected. 完成后，该对象处于可访问但处于无效状态，因而无法使用。After finalization, the object is accessible but in an invalid state and therefore unusable. 最终，垃圾回收完成，并回收对象。Eventually, garbage collection completes and reclaims the object. 在下列情况之一调用对象的完成方法： 垃圾回收期间时公共语言运行时正在关闭，或卸载应用程序域包含的对象时。An object's finalization method is called in one of the following situations: during garbage collection, when the common language runtime is shutting down, or when the application domain that contains the object is unloaded. 方法返回`true`仅在最后一种情况; 它不返回`true`如果终止结果从例程垃圾回收或 CLR 关闭。The method returns `true` only in the last case; it does not return `true` if finalization results from routine garbage collection or from CLR shutdown. > [!NOTE] > 若要确定终止是否由于 CLR 已关闭，请使用属性。To determine whether finalization is due to CLR shutdown, use the property. 它将返回`true`终止是否由于应用程序域正在卸载或者 CLR 正在关闭。It returns `true` if finalization is due to an application domain being unloaded or to the CLR shutting down. 执行时终止方法中在域卸载过程，你可能想要访问另一个对象引用的静态字段，已终止方法。While executing in your finalization method during domain unloading, you might want to access another object that is referenced by a static field and has a finalization method. 但是，不能可靠地这样做是因为访问的对象可能已终止。However, you cannot reliably do so because the accessed object might already have been finalized. > [!NOTE] > 此规则的唯一例外是类，该类包含引用流对象的静态字段，但比较特殊，以便你可以始终写入系统控制台中，即使在域卸载或系统关闭期间实现。An exception to this rule is the class, which contains static fields that reference stream objects, but is implemented specially so you can always write to the system console, even during domain unloading or system shutdown. 在对象的完成方法使用此方法，以确定是否包含对象的应用程序域正在卸载。Use this method in an object's finalization method to determine whether the application domain that contains the object is unloading. 如果是这种情况，你无法可靠地访问任何对象，具有完成方法并由静态字段引用。If that is the case, you cannot reliably access any object that has a finalization method and is referenced by a static field.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsFullyTrusted { get; }
.property instance bool IsFullyTrusted
Public ReadOnly Property IsFullyTrusted As Boolean
public: property bool IsFullyTrusted { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示加载到当前应用程序域的程序集是否是以完全信任方式执行的。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether assemblies that are loaded into the current application domain execute with full trust.

value.span: 如果加载到当前应用程序域的程序集是以完全信任方式执行的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if assemblies that are loaded into the current application domain execute with full trust; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法始终返回`true`在桌面上运行的应用程序的默认应用程序域。This method always returns `true` for the default application domain of an application that runs on the desktop. 它将返回`false`通过使用创建的沙盒应用程序域方法重载，除非授予应用程序域的权限是等效于完全信任。It returns `false` for a sandboxed application domain that was created by using the method overload, unless the permissions that are granted to the application domain are equivalent to full trust. ## Examples 下面的示例演示属性和具有完全受信任和部分受信任的应用程序域属性。The following example demonstrates the property and the property with fully trusted and partially trusted application domains. 完全受信任的应用程序域是应用程序的默认应用程序域。The fully trusted application domain is the default application domain for the application. 通过创建部分受信任的应用程序域方法重载。The partially trusted application domain is created by using the method overload. 该示例使用`Worker`派生自的类，因此它可以跨应用程序域边界进行封送。The example uses a `Worker` class that derives from , so it can be marshaled across application domain boundaries. 该示例创建`Worker`默认应用程序域中的对象。The example creates a `Worker` object in the default application domain. 然后，它调用`TestIsFullyTrusted`方法以显示应用程序域和程序加载到应用程序域的两个程序集的属性值： mscorlib 除外，它是.NET Framework 中，并将示例程序集的一部分。It then calls the `TestIsFullyTrusted` method to display the property value for the application domain and for two assemblies that are loaded into the application domain: mscorlib, which is part of the .NET Framework, and the example assembly. 应用程序域是完全受信任的因此两个程序集是完全受信任。The application domain is fully trusted, so both assemblies are fully trusted. 此示例将创建另一个`Worker`对象在沙盒应用程序域并再次调用`TestIsFullyTrusted`方法。The example creates another `Worker` object in a sandboxed application domain and again calls the `TestIsFullyTrusted` method. Mscorlib 始终是受信任的即使在部分受信任的应用程序域中，但示例程序集是部分受信任。Mscorlib is always trusted, even in a partially trusted application domain, but the example assembly is partially trusted. [!code-csharp[System.AppDomain.IsFullyTrusted#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.isfullytrusted/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomain.IsFullyTrusted#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.isfullytrusted/vb/example.vb#1)]

.property instance bool IsHomogenous
Public ReadOnly Property IsHomogenous As Boolean
public: property bool IsHomogenous { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当前应用程序域是否拥有一个为加载到该应用程序域的所有程序集授予的权限集。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current application domain has a set of permissions that is granted to all assemblies that are loaded into the application domain.

value.span: 如果当前应用程序域具有一组同构权限，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the current application domain has a homogenous set of permissions; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回`true`使用创建的沙盒应用程序域方法重载。This property returns `true` for sandboxed application domains that were created by using the method overload. 沙盒应用程序域具有一组同构权限;也就是说，所有部分受信任的程序集加载到应用程序域授予相同的权限集。Sandboxed application domains have a homogenous set of permissions; that is, the same set of permissions is granted to all partially trusted assemblies that are loaded into the application domain. 沙盒应用程序域 （可选） 有不受此权限集，并改为使用完全信任运行具有强名称程序集的列表。A sandboxed application domain optionally has a list of strong-named assemblies that are exempt from this permission set, and instead run with full trust. 完全受信任的代码可以使用属性来确定沙盒应用程序域的同构的授予集。Fully trusted code can use the property to determine the homogenous grant set of a sandboxed application domain. 此属性也会返回`true`默认应用程序域的桌面应用程序，因为该应用程序域的所有程序集授予完全信任。This property also returns `true` for the default application domain of a desktop application, because that application domain grants full trust to all assemblies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，使用此方法加载程序集的信任级别是应用程序域的信任级别相同。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the trust level of an assembly that is loaded by using this method is the same as the trust level of the application domain. 应使用此方法只是为了将程序集加载到当前的应用程序域。This method should be used only to load an assembly into the current application domain. 为方便起见那些不能调用静态的互操作性调用方提供此方法是方法。This method is provided as a convenience for interoperability callers who cannot call the static method. 若要将程序集加载到其他应用程序域中，使用一种方法如。To load assemblies into other application domains, use a method such as . 普遍适用于此方法的所有重载的信息，请参阅方法重载。For information that is common to all overloads of this method, see the method overload. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用原始程序集加载。The following sample demonstrates the use of loading a raw assembly. 若要运行此代码示例，你必须提供完全限定程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 应使用此方法只是为了将程序集加载到当前的应用程序域。This method should be used only to load an assembly into the current application domain. 为方便起见那些不能调用静态的互操作性调用方提供此方法是方法。This method is provided as a convenience for interoperability callers who cannot call the static method. 若要将程序集加载到其他应用程序域中，使用一种方法如。To load assemblies into other application domains, use a method such as . 如果已加载请求的程序集的版本，则此方法返回加载的程序集，即使请求的不同版本。If a version of the requested assembly is already loaded, this method returns the loaded assembly, even if a different version is requested. 提供的部分程序集名称`assemblyRef`不建议。Supplying a partial assembly name for `assemblyRef` is not recommended. （一个或多个区域性、 版本或公钥标记，则会忽略部分名称。(A partial name omits one or more of culture, version, or public key token. 对于采用字符串而不是重载对象，"MyAssembly，Version = 1.0.0.0"是一个示例部分的名称和"MyAssembly，Version = 1.0.0.0，Culture = neutral，PublicKeyToken = 18ab3442da84b47"举例说明的完整名称。)使用部分名称具有负面性能影响。For overloads that take a string instead of an object, "MyAssembly, Version=1.0.0.0" is an example of a partial name and "MyAssembly, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=18ab3442da84b47" is an example of a full name.) Using partial names has a negative effect on performance. 此外，部分程序集名称可以加载程序集从全局程序集缓存只有在应用程序基目录中的程序集的一个精确副本 (或)。In addition, a partial assembly name can load an assembly from the global assembly cache only if there is an exact copy of the assembly in the application base directory ( or ). 如果当前对象表示应用程序域`A`，和方法从应用程序域调用`B`，程序集将会加载到这两个应用程序域。If the current object represents application domain `A`, and the method is called from application domain `B`, the assembly is loaded into both application domains. 例如，下面的代码加载`MyAssembly`到新的应用程序域`ChildDomain`和也到的应用程序域中执行的代码：For example, the following code loads `MyAssembly` into the new application domain `ChildDomain` and also into the application domain where the code executes: [!code-cpp[System.AppDomain.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.load/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.AppDomain.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.load/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomain.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.load/vb/source.vb#1)] 程序集加载到这两个域，因为不是派生自，因此返回的值和方法不能进行封送处理。The assembly is loaded into both domains because does not derive from , and therefore the return value of the method cannot be marshaled. 相反，公共语言运行时尝试加载到调用应用程序域的程序集。Instead, the common language runtime tries to load the assembly into the calling application domain. 如果两个应用程序域的路径设置不同，到两个应用程序域加载的程序集可能有所不同。The assemblies that are loaded into the two application domains might be different if the path settings for the two application domains are different. > [!NOTE] > 如果这两个属性和属性设置，在首次尝试加载程序集使用的显示名称 (包括版本、 区域性和等等，返回为属性)。If both the property and the property are set, the first attempt to load the assembly uses the display name (including version, culture, and so on, as returned by the property). 如果未找到该文件，属性用于搜索程序集。If the file is not found, the property is used to search for the assembly. 如果使用找到的程序集，与程序集匹配的显示名称。If the assembly is found using , the display name is matched against the assembly. 如果匹配失败，引发。If the match fails, a is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，使用此方法加载程序集的信任级别是应用程序域的信任级别相同。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the trust level of an assembly that is loaded by using this method is the same as the trust level of the application domain. 应使用此方法只是为了将程序集加载到当前的应用程序域。This method should be used only to load an assembly into the current application domain. 为方便起见那些不能调用静态的互操作性调用方提供此方法是方法。This method is provided as a convenience for interoperability callers who cannot call the static method. 若要将程序集加载到其他应用程序域中，使用一种方法如。To load assemblies into other application domains, use a method such as . 普遍适用于此方法的所有重载的信息，请参阅方法重载。For information that is common to all overloads of this method, see the method overload. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用原始程序集加载。The following sample demonstrates the use of loading a raw assembly. 若要运行此代码示例，你必须提供完全限定程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否对当前进程启用应用程序域的 CPU 和内存监视。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether CPU and memory monitoring of application domains is enabled for the current process.

summary.span: 一旦对进程启用了监视，则无法将其禁用。

span.span: Once monitoring is enabled for a process, it cannot be disabled.

value.span: 如果启用监视，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if monitoring is enabled; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这`static`属性 (`Shared`属性在 Visual Basic) 控制 CPU 和内存监视的进程中的所有应用程序域。This `static` property (`Shared` property in Visual Basic) controls CPU and memory monitoring of all the application domains in the process. 如果你尝试将此属性设置为`false`、引发异常，即使该属性的当前值是`false`。If you attempt to set this property to `false`, a exception is thrown, even if the current value of the property is `false`. 一旦启用了监视，则可以使用， ， ，和实例监视 CPU 和内存使用情况的各个应用程序域的属性。Once monitoring is enabled, you can use the , , , and instance properties to monitor CPU and memory use of individual application domains.

summary.span: 获取上次回收后保留下来的，已知由当前应用程序域引用的字节数。

span.span: Gets the number of bytes that survived the last collection and that are known to be referenced by the current application domain.

value.span: 保留下来的字节数。

span.span: The number of surviving bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与每个垃圾回收更新统计信息。The statistics are updated with each garbage collection. 但是，可确保只有在完整、 阻碍性回收; 后才会准确也就是说，的集合包含所有代并停止应用程序时集合时发生。However, they are guaranteed to be accurate only after a full, blocking collection; that is, a collection that includes all generations and that stops the application while collection occurs. 例如，方法重载执行的完整、 阻碍性回收。For example, the method overload performs a full, blocking collection. （并发回收发生在后台，并且不会阻止应用程序。）(Concurrent collection occurs in the background and does not block the application.)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 完整的阻碍性回收之后，字节数当前实时上保留该数字表示托管堆。After a full, blocking collection, this number represents the number of bytes currently held live on managed heaps. 它应接近其报告的使用期限方法。It should be close to the number reported by the method. 暂时回收之后，该数字表示的字节数当前中实时保留暂时代。After an ephemeral collection, this number represents the number of bytes currently held live in ephemeral generations.

summary.span: 获取自从进程启动后所有线程在当前应用程序域中执行时所使用的总处理器时间。

span.span: Gets the total processor time that has been used by all threads while executing in the current application domain, since the process started.

value.span: 当前应用程序域的总处理器时间。

span.span: Total processor time for the current application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序域报告的总时间包括在该应用程序域中执行的过程中的每个线程所用的时间。The total time that is reported for an application domain includes the time each thread in the process spent executing in that application domain. 调入非托管代码的线程仍关联与应用程序域，并且执行非托管的代码报告应用程序域调用已花费的处理器时间。A thread that calls into unmanaged code is still associated with an application domain, and the processor time spent executing the unmanaged code is reported for the application domain where the call was made. 当线程被阻止或睡眠，它不占用处理器时间。When a thread is blocked or sleeping, it does not consume processor time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用创建的沙盒应用程序域方法重载具有一组同构权限; 也就是说，对所有部分受信任的程序集加载到应用程序域授予相同的权限集。Sandboxed application domains that were created by using the method overload have a homogenous set of permissions; that is, the same set of permissions is granted to all partially trusted assemblies that are loaded into the application domain. 沙盒应用程序域 （可选） 有不受此权限集，并改为使用完全信任运行具有强名称程序集的列表。A sandboxed application domain optionally has a list of strong-named assemblies that are exempt from this permission set, and instead run with full trust.
