Public Custom Event ProcessExit As EventHandler
public: virtual event EventHandler ^ ProcessExit;

summary.span: 当默认应用程序域的父进程存在时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the default application domain's parent process exits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可以执行终止活动，如关闭文件，释放存储空间等，进程结束之前。The for this event can perform termination activities, such as closing files, releasing storage and so on, before the process ends. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，每个应用程序域中注册事件处理程序中引发此事件。Beginning with the .NET Framework version 2.0, this event is raised in each application domain that registers an event handler. > [!NOTE] > 总执行时间的所有事件处理程序是有限的正如所有终结器的总执行时间是有限进程关闭时一样。The total execution time of all event handlers is limited, just as the total execution time of all finalizers is limited at process shutdown. 默认值为两秒。The default is two seconds. 非托管的主机可以通过调用来更改此执行时间[iclrpolicymanager:: Settimeout](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/hosting/iclrpolicymanager-settimeout-method.md)方法替换[OPR_ProcessExit](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/hosting/eclroperation-enumeration.md)枚举值。An unmanaged host can change this execution time by calling the [ICLRPolicyManager::SetTimeout](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/hosting/iclrpolicymanager-settimeout-method.md) method with the [OPR_ProcessExit](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/hosting/eclroperation-enumeration.md) enumeration value. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，此事件是引发仅在默认应用程序域，且仅当在默认应用程序域中注册事件处理程序。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, this event is raised only in the default application domain, and only if an event handler is registered in the default application domain. 若要注册的事件处理程序此事件，你必须具有所需的权限，或引发。To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a is thrown. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

summary.span: 当程序集的解析在仅限反射的上下文中失败时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the resolution of an assembly fails in the reflection-only context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在仅限反射上下文中，依赖关系将不自动解析。In the reflection-only context, dependencies are not resolved automatically. 它们必须预加载或返回的此事件的处理程序。They must be preloaded or returned by the handler for this event. 当程序集具有尚未加载到只反射上下文的依赖项时，引发此事件。This event is raised when an assembly has a dependency that is not already loaded into the reflection-only context. 通过指定缺少的依赖关系属性。The missing dependency is specified by the property. 此事件必须返回满足此依赖关系的程序集。The for this event must return an assembly that satisfies the dependency. 返回程序集必须加载到只反射上下文。The assembly that is returned must be loaded into the reflection-only context. > [!IMPORTANT] > 仅为缺少的依赖关系，若要加载到只反射上下文的程序集将引发此事件 (例如，通过使用方法)。This event is raised only for missing dependencies of the assembly that you are loading into the reflection-only context (for example, by using the method). 它不被引发如果找不到要加载的程序集。It is not raised if the assembly that you are loading cannot be found. 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]、属性返回的请求无法解析的程序集加载的程序集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the property returns the assembly that requested the assembly load that could not be resolved. 了解请求的程序集的标识可能很有用中标识正确版本的依赖项，如果多个版本可用。Knowing the identity of the requesting assembly might be useful in identifying the correct version of the dependency, if more than one version is available. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 对于此事件，应用策略之前，属性将返回的程序集名称。For this event, the property returns the assembly name before policy is applied. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为此事件可以尝试查找包含该资源的程序集并将其返回。The for this event can attempt to locate the assembly containing the resource and return it. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果解析失败，因为没有文件可以找到有效链接资源，不被引发此事件。This event is not raised if resolution fails because no file can be found for a valid linked resource. 如果找不到的清单资源流，但它不会引发如果找不到单独的资源键，则将引发此事件。It is raised if a manifest resource stream cannot be found, but it is not raised if an individual resource key cannot be found. 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]、属性包含请求资源的程序集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the property contains the assembly that requested the resource. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 若要注册的事件处理程序此事件，你必须具有所需的权限，或引发。To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a is thrown. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法来插入项时，或者修改描述的此实例的属性的名称数据对内部缓存中的条目的值。Use this method to insert an entry, or modify the value of an entry in an internal cache of name-data pairs that describe properties of this instance of . 该缓存自动包含在创建应用程序域后插入的预定义的系统项。The cache automatically contains predefined system entries that are inserted when the application domain is created. 无法插入或修改系统项使用此方法。You cannot insert or modify system entries with this method. 尝试来修改系统条目的方法调用起任何作用;该方法不引发异常。A method call that attempts to modify a system entry has no effect; the method does not throw an exception. 你可以检查与系统项的值方法或等效属性中所述。You can inspect the values of system entries with the method, or the equivalent properties described in . 你可以调用此方法以设置由供电"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT"评估正则表达式模式的默认超时间隔的值的值作为`name`自变量和一个表示超时值时间间隔数值类型的值`data`自变量。You can call this method to set the value of the default timeout interval for evaluating regular expression patterns by supply "REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" as the value of the `name` argument and a value that represents the timeout interval as the value of the `data` argument. 此外可以插入或修改你自己的用户定义名称数据对使用此方法，并检查它们的值与方法。You can also insert or modify your own user defined name-data pairs with this method and inspect their values with the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来创建新的值对。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create a new value pair. 然后该示例使用方法来检索值，并将其显示到控制台。The example then uses the method to retrieve the value, and displays it to the console. summary.span: 在对类型的解析失败时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the resolution of a type fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时公共语言运行时无法确定可以创建请求的类型的程序集。The event occurs when the common language runtime is unable to determine the assembly that can create the requested type. 如果在动态程序集，定义的类型或类型未定义动态程序集中，但运行时不知道程序集类型中定义的类型便会出现此问题。This can occur if the type is defined in a dynamic assembly, or the type is not defined in a dynamic assembly but the runtime does not know which assembly the type is defined in. 后一种情况可能发生时调用时使用程序集名称未限定的类型名称。The latter situation can occur when is called with a type name that is not qualified with the assembly name. 为此事件可以尝试查找并创建类型。The for this event can attempt to locate and create the type. 但是，事件不会发生如果运行时知道不能以查找特定的程序集中的类型。However, the event does not occur if the runtime knows it is not possible to find a type in certain assemblies. 例如，如果因为运行时知道类型不能动态添加到静态程序集不在静态程序集中找到了类型，也不会发生此事件。For example, this event does not occur if the type is not found in a static assembly because the runtime knows types cannot be added dynamically to static assemblies. 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]、属性包含请求的类型的程序集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the property contains the assembly that requested the type. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 若要注册的事件处理程序此事件，你必须具有所需的权限，或引发。To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a is thrown. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何事件。The following sample demonstrates the event. 若要运行此代码示例，你必须提供完全限定程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). [!code-cpp[AppDomain_TypeResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_TypeResolve/CPP/typeresolve.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_TypeResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_TypeResolve/CS/typeresolve.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_TypeResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_TypeResolve/VB/typeresolve.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public event UnhandledExceptionEventHandler UnhandledException;
.event class System.UnhandledExceptionEventHandler UnhandledException
Public Custom Event UnhandledException As UnhandledExceptionEventHandler
public: virtual event UnhandledExceptionEventHandler ^ UnhandledException;

summary.span: 当某个异常未被捕获时出现。

span.span: Occurs when an exception is not caught.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件提供通知未捕获的异常。This event provides notification of uncaught exceptions. 它允许应用程序来记录有关异常的信息，系统默认处理程序将异常报告给用户和终止应用程序之前。It allows the application to log information about the exception before the system default handler reports the exception to the user and terminates the application. 如果提供了有关状态的应用程序的足够信息，可以采取其他措施-例如保存更高版本的恢复的程序数据。If sufficient information about the state of the application is available, other actions may be undertaken — such as saving program data for later recovery. 建议小心，因为不处理异常时，可能会损坏程序数据。Caution is advised, because program data can become corrupted when exceptions are not handled. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，应用程序终止时和调试选项会报告给用户中，将引发此事件之前，而不是之后。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, application termination and debugging options are reported to the user before this event is raised, rather than after. 可以在任何应用程序域中处理此事件。This event can be handled in any application domain. 但是，引发该事件是不一定在何处出现异常的应用程序域中。However, the event is not necessarily raised in the application domain where the exception occurred. 仅当没有找到适用的异常处理程序，因此可以引发该事件的第一个位置是在生成该线程的应用程序域已被线程的整个堆栈展开，会处理异常。An exception is unhandled only if the entire stack for the thread has been unwound without finding an applicable exception handler, so the first place the event can be raised is in the application domain where the thread originated. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，仅为应用程序启动时由系统创建的默认应用程序域发生此事件。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, this event occurs only for the default application domain that is created by the system when an application is started. 如果应用程序创建其他应用程序域，在这些应用程序域中指定为此事件的委托无效。If an application creates additional application domains, specifying a delegate for this event in those applications domains has no effect. 如果默认应用程序域中处理事件，将引发此事件存在的任何未经处理的异常在任何线程，无论哪个应用程序域启动的线程。If the event is handled in the default application domain, it is raised there for any unhandled exception in any thread, no matter what application domain the thread started in. 如果在应用程序域中的事件处理程序中启动线程，该应用程序域中引发事件。If the thread started in an application domain that has an event handler for , the event is raised in that application domain. 如果该应用程序域不是默认应用程序域，并且还存在一个事件处理程序在默认应用程序域中，将两个应用程序域中引发事件。If that application domain is not the default application domain, and there is also an event handler in the default application domain, the event is raised in both application domains. 例如，假设在线程启动应用程序域"AD1"应用程序域"AD2"中调用的方法，并从那里调用的方法在应用程序域"AD3"，它将引发异常。For example, suppose a thread starts in application domain "AD1", calls a method in application domain "AD2", and from there calls a method in application domain "AD3", where it throws an exception. 在其中的第一个应用程序域可以引发事件是"AD1"。The first application domain in which the event can be raised is "AD1". 如果该应用程序域不是默认应用程序域，那么还可以在默认应用程序域中引发事件。If that application domain is not the default application domain, the event can also be raised in the default application domain. > [!NOTE] > 公共语言运行时挂起时事件处理程序的线程中止事件一起执行。The common language runtime suspends thread aborts while event handlers for the event are executing. 如果事件处理程序具有属性具有相应的标志，事件处理程序被视为受约束的执行区域。If the event handler has a attribute with the appropriate flags, the event handler is treated as a constrained execution region. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，此事件不会引发的异常的损坏状态的进程，如堆栈溢出或访问冲突，除非事件处理程序是安全关键，并且具有属性。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], this event is not raised for exceptions that corrupt the state of the process, such as stack overflows or access violations, unless the event handler is security-critical and has the attribute. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，在主应用程序线程外的线程中出现未经处理的异常将由运行时捕获，并因此不会导致应用程序终止。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, an unhandled exception that occurs in a thread other than the main application thread is caught by the runtime and therefore does not cause the application to terminate. 因此，很可能不终止的应用程序的情况下引发的事件。Thus, it is possible for the event to be raised without the application terminating. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，此对子子线程中未经处理的异常已被移除，因为这种无提示故障的累积效应包括性能下降，损坏的数据和锁定，它们都非常难以调试。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, this backstop for unhandled exceptions in child threads was removed, because the cumulative effect of such silent failures included performance degradation, corrupted data, and lockups, all of which were difficult to debug. 有关详细信息，包括列表的情况下在其中运行时不会终止，请参阅[托管线程中的异常](~/docs/standard/threading/exceptions-in-managed-threads.md)。For more information, including a list of cases in which the runtime does not terminate, see [Exceptions in Managed Threads](~/docs/standard/threading/exceptions-in-managed-threads.md). 若要注册的事件处理程序此事件，你必须具有所需的权限，或引发。To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a is thrown. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## 未经处理的异常的其他事件Other Events for Unhandled Exceptions 对于某些应用程序模型，事件可以由其他事件抢先，如果在主应用程序线程中出现未经处理的异常。For certain application models, the event can be preempted by other events if the unhandled exception occurs in the main application thread. 使用 Windows 窗体的应用程序中未经处理的异常中的主应用程序线程原因引发事件。In applications that use Windows Forms, unhandled exceptions in the main application thread cause the event to be raised. 如果处理此事件，默认行为是未处理的异常不会终止该应用程序，尽管应用程序处于未知状态。If this event is handled, the default behavior is that the unhandled exception does not terminate the application, although the application is left in an unknown state. 在这种情况下，不会引发事件。In that case, the event is not raised. 可以更改此行为，通过使用应用程序配置文件，或通过使用方法以将模式更改为之前事件处理程序挂钩。This behavior can be changed by using the application configuration file, or by using the method to change the mode to before the event handler is hooked up. 这仅适用于主应用程序线程。This applies only to the main application thread. 事件引发的其他线程中引发的未经处理异常。The event is raised for unhandled exceptions thrown in other threads. Visual Basic 应用程序框架从 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005 开始，提供有关在主应用程序线程中未经处理的异常的另一个事件。Starting with Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, the Visual Basic application framework provides another event for unhandled exceptions in the main application thread. 请参阅事件。See the event. 此事件具有与使用的事件自变量对象同名的事件自变量对象，但具有不同的属性。This event has an event arguments object with the same name as the event arguments object used by , but with different properties. 具体而言，此事件自变量对象具有属性，它允许应用程序能够继续运行，忽略未经处理的异常 （并会使应用程序处于未知状态）。In particular, this event arguments object has an property that allows the application to continue running, ignoring the unhandled exception (and leaving the application in an unknown state). 在这种情况下，不会引发事件。In that case, the event is not raised. ## Examples 以下示例演示事件。The followingexample demonstrates the event. 它定义事件处理程序， `MyHandler`，每当在默认应用程序域中引发未处理的异常时调用。It defines an event handler, `MyHandler`, that is invoked whenever an unhandled exception is thrown in the default application domain. 然后，它将引发两个例外。It then throws two exceptions. 第一个由**try/catch**块。The first is handled by a **try/catch** block. 第二个未经处理，并调用`MyHandle`例程之前在应用程序终止。The second is unhandled and invokes the `MyHandle` routine before the application terminates. [!code-cpp[AppDomain_UnhandledException#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_UnhandledException/CPP/unhandledexception.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_UnhandledException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_UnhandledException/CS/unhandledexception.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_UnhandledException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_UnhandledException/VB/unhandledexception.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Unload (AppDomain domain);
.method public static hidebysig void Unload(class System.AppDomain domain) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Unload (domain As AppDomain)
public: static void Unload(AppDomain ^ domain);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.ReliabilityContract(System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.Consistency.MayCorruptAppDomain, System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.Cer.MayFail)

param.name: domain
param.span: 要卸载的应用程序域。

span.span: An application domain to unload.

summary.span: 卸载指定的应用程序域。

span.span: Unloads the specified application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 2.0 版中没有一个线程专用于卸载应用程序域。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 there is a thread dedicated to unloading application domains. 这将提高可靠性，尤其是在.NET Framework 承载。This improves reliability, especially when the .NET Framework is hosted. 当线程调用，目标域标记为要卸载。When a thread calls , the target domain is marked for unloading. 专用的线程尝试卸载的域和域中的所有线程都将立即都中止。The dedicated thread attempts to unload the domain, and all threads in the domain are aborted. 如果一个线程不会中止，例如因为它执行非托管的代码，或是因为正在执行`finally`块，然后在一段时间后的在最初调用的线程中引发。If a thread does not abort, for example because it is executing unmanaged code, or because it is executing a `finally` block, then after a period of time a is thrown in the thread that originally called . 如果不可能最终会中止的线程结束，则目标域不卸载。If the thread that could not be aborted eventually ends, the target domain is not unloaded. 因此，在.NET Framework 2.0 版`domain`不能保证卸载，因为它可能不能终止正在执行的线程。Thus, in the .NET Framework version 2.0 `domain` is not guaranteed to unload, because it might not be possible to terminate executing threads. > [!NOTE] > 在某些情况下，调用导致即时，例如如果就是在终结器。In some cases, calling causes an immediate , for example if it is called in a finalizer. 中的线程`domain`被终止使用方法，将引发线程中。The threads in `domain` are terminated using the method, which throws a in the thread. 尽管线程应立即终止，它可以继续执行可不可预测的时间量中`finally`子句。Although the thread should terminate promptly, it can continue executing for an unpredictable amount of time in a `finally` clause. ## 版本兼容性Version Compatibility .NET framework 版本 1.0 和 1.1 中，如果调用线程正在以`domain`，另一个线程开始执行卸载操作。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1 if the thread that calls is running in `domain`, another thread is started to perform the unload operation. 如果`domain`无法卸载，该线程，不在原始调用的线程中引发。If `domain` cannot be unloaded, a is thrown in that thread, not in the original thread that called . 但是，如果调用线程外部运行`domain`，线程将收到异常。However, if the thread that calls is running outside `domain`, that thread receives the exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何卸载应用程序域。The following code example shows how to unload an application domain. [!code-cpp[ADUnload#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADUnload/CPP/adunload.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADUnload#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADUnload/CS/adunload.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADUnload#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADUnload/VB/adunload.vb#1)]
